group_1.textRight: So, um, why do I need to come along for@this?
Do you really need me here with you?

group_1.textLeft: Of course! This can be your thanks for when@I helped you patrol!

group_1.textRight: I already thanked you with a rice omelet@though!

group_1.textLeft: My, who knew the chef at Walnut's had such a@cold heart!

group_1.textRight: What do you mean by that, exactly...?
I'm just saying, most people can go and@buy a book on their own.

group_1.textLeft: I'm having you act as my bodyguard!
I can't be seen simply coming in to buy my@own magazine spread myself.
Just think of the rumors that could start.
I'd be too embarrassed to keep on living!

group_1.textRight: You're constantly doing stuff that's WAY@more embarrassing than this.

group_1.textLeft: Aaah, there it is! This one! It's this one!@Vanity Fine, the September issue!

group_1.textRight: Wow, are you really in this magazine?

group_1.textLeft: I really am! On the page for "the trendiest@girls with the rawest potential".
It's a pretty impressive publication to be@making my print debut in, no?

group_1.textRight: Okay, let's see... Oh look, there's Yachiyo.
"30 Days of Yachiyo's Stylish Outfits!"@That's her, isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what is the meaning of this?!

group_1.textRight: Whoa, it goes on for 8 pages, no ad breaks@or anything!

group_1.textLeft: In my debut issue, of all issues!
This... She must have done this as part of@an ingenious plot to mock me!
[chara:301001:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger][flashEffect:flashWhite1]I'll never let her get away with this!

group_1.textRight: You ripped right through that magazine@in your rage, so you'll have to pay for it!

group_1.textCenter: I'll show her! Someday she'll know that she's@nothing more than second place behind me!
